<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.ProgramStatus</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>ProgramStatus</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var ProgramStatus = Class.create();
ProgramStatus.prototype = {
	
	fieldsMap: {
		cost: 'cost_status', 
		resources: 'resource_status', 
		schedule: 'schedule_status', 
		scope: 'scope_status'
	},
	
    initialize: function(programId) {
		this.sysId = programId;
		this.gr = this.getGlideRecord();
    },
	
	getGlideRecord: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('pm_program');
		gr.get(this.sysId);
		return gr;
	},
	
	update: function() {
		this.valueMap = {};
		var projects = this.allProjects();
		while(projects.next()){
			var statusGr = this.projectStatus(projects.getUniqueValue());
			if(statusGr.isValidRecord())
				this.updateStatus(statusGr);
		}
		for (var field in this.valueMap) {
			this.gr.setValue(field, this.valueMap[field]);
		}
		this.gr.update();
	},
	
	updateOverallStatusFromProjects: function() {
		this.valueMap = {};
		var projects = this.allProjects();
		while(projects.next()){
				this.valueMap['status'] = this.findColor(projects, 'status', 'status');
		}
		var status = this.valueMap['status'];
		if (JSUtil.notNil(status)) {
			this.gr.setValue('status', status);
			this.gr.update();
		}
	},
	
	updateStatus: function(statusGr) {
		for (var projectStatusField in this.fieldsMap) {
			var programField = this.fieldsMap[projectStatusField];
			if (this.gr.isValidField(programField))
				this.valueMap[programField] = this.findColor(statusGr, projectStatusField, programField);
		}
	},
	
	findColor: function(statusGr, sourceField, targetField) {
		var currentVal = this.valueMap[targetField];
		var statusGrVal = statusGr.getValue(sourceField);
		if (currentVal == 'red' || statusGrVal == 'red')
			return 'red';
		else if (currentVal == 'yellow' || statusGrVal == 'yellow')
			return 'yellow';
		else
			return 'green';
	},
	
	allProjects: function() {
		var gr = new GlideRecord('pm_project');
		gr.addQuery('top_program', this.sysId);
		gr.addQuery('show_on_program_status_report', true);
		gr.addEncodedQuery('parentISEMPTY');
		gr.query();
		return gr;
	},
	
	projectStatus: function (sysId) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord("project_status");
        gr.addQuery("project", sysId);
        gr.orderByDesc("as_on");
		gr.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr.query();
        gr.next();
        return gr;
    },
	
    type: 'ProgramStatus'
};]]></script>
